alert.note: Alert for Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 6:56PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Calcasieu Parish, south central Newton and northeastern Orange Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 656 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Toomey, or near Vinton. The strong thunderstorm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orange, West Orange, Vinton, Deweyville, Pinehurst, Hartburg, Forest Heights, and Toomey. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 880 and 874. Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
